item.title: Overall Description
item.description:
Article Data information:
- Descriptive information about exomic analysis of 11 patients with with Pyoderma Grangrenosum.

Table S1:

Table S1: Distribution of variants from Exome of 11 patients with with Pyoderma Grangrenosum.

ID group All ExonVar FuncVar ImpactVar Rare
HSM110 VERYSEVERE 103977 31116 290 3858 3389
HSM115 SEVERE 112575 32426 298 3880 3710
HSM117 VERYSEVERE 121600 33352 286 3981 4091
HSM144 SEVERE 107561 32310 298 4017 3721
HSM43 SEVERE 119230 33314 300 4002 3736
HSM48 VERYSEVERE 123682 33079 315 3963 4243
HSM51 SEVERE 110628 32149 296 3903 3610
HSM73 VERYSEVERE 115748 32900 287 3971 4133
HSM83 VERYSEVERE 111706 32003 298 3911 3563
HSM96 SEVERE 112341 31915 278 3896 3455
HSM97 VERYSEVERE 113822 32418 296 3981 3817

FunctVar: Functional variant;
ImpactVar: Variants with a prediction impact higher than 1 or CADD >=15.

Table S2: Distribution of variants from Exome in 11 patients with Pyoderma Grangrenosum, according to severity.

All ExonVar FuncVar ImpactVar Rare
verysevere 114785 32659 293 3967 3954
severe 112341 32310 298 3903 3710

item.title: Group Comparisons
item.description:
Article Data information:
- Descriptive information about exomic analysis of the 11 patients with Pyoderma Grangrenosum.

Figure S5:

Figure S5: Venn diagram of common FunctVar

Table S3.1:

Table S3.1: List of the 23 common FunctVar present on verysevere patient's group not common on severe groups

FunctVar: Functional variant;
ImpactVar: Variants with a prediction impact higher than 1 or CADD >=15.

Table S3.2:

Table S3.2: List of the 33 common FunctVar present on severe patient's group not common on verysevere groups

ImpactVar: Variants with a prediction impact higher than 1 or CADD >=15.

item.title: Variant Enrichment Analysis
item.description:
VEA Group Analysis
- Descriptive information about exomic analysis pathway of 11 patients with with Pyoderma Grangrenosum.

To access individual information of VEA, click here

To access Groups information of filtered VEA (Features), click here

Filtered VEA (Features):
